snippet: The conductor Paul Hillier and Theater of Voices presented works by the composer David Lang at Zankel Hall on Friday.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews program of music by David Lang, performed by Theater of Voices and Shara Worden at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: The conductor Paul Hillier and Theater of Voices presented works by the composer David Lang at Zankel Hall on Friday.

headline.seo: David Lang’s Music at Zankel Hall
headline.main: A Gathering for Both Conversing and Playing
headline.print_headline: A Gathering For Both Conversing And Playing
